author: USA TODAY, Rasha Ali, USA TODAY
title: Megyn Kelly recalls telling her 10-year-old the 'awful' news his teacher died from coronavirus
description: Megyn Kelly's 10-year-old son found out his music teacher die from coronavirus. She recalls having to break the terrible news to him.
content:
Both Dr. Oz and Dr. Phil appeared on Fox News separately to talk about the coronavirus pandemic.
USA TODAY
Megyn Kelly is opening up about the loss of her 10-year-old son's music teacher to coronavirus and how she broke the terrible news to her child.
